definitions.definition: The act of ascending ; a motion upwards.
examples: He made a tedious ascent of Mont Blanc.

definitions.definition: The way or means by which one ascends .
examples: There is a difficult northern ascent from Malaucene of Mont Ventoux .

definitions.definition: An eminence, hill, or high place.
The degree of elevation of an object, or the angle it makes with a horizontal line; inclination ; gradient ; steepness
examples: The road has an ascent of 5 degrees.

definitions.definition: The ascender height in a typeface .
An increase, for example in popularity or hierarchy

main_definition: The act of ascending ; a motion upwards.
secondary_definitions: The way or means by which one ascends .
An eminence, hill, or high place.
The degree of elevation of an object, or the angle it makes with a horizontal line; inclination ; gradient ; steepness
( typography ) The ascender height in a typeface .
An increase, for example in popularity or hierarchy
